channel.title: Voice API on Vonage Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Voice API on Vonage Workshop

item.title: Certification Project
item.description: Voice API Certification Use case Build a Voice API call menu that presents your users with a list of options. These should include: Listening to an audio file of your choice Hearing the current time and date Being transferred to another number that you own with a “we are now connecting you to an agent who will be able to help you” message Use any supported SDK to achieve this.
